p: This study describes the biologic variation over time of the PD-1 pathway in cHL. In paired biopsies from previously untreated and previously treated patients with primary and relapsed cHL, respectively, we found that PD-1 and PD-L1 were upregulated in the relapsed ( treated) group, and a tendency that PD-L1+ leukocytes were upregulated in the untreated group ( Fig 4).
